mapper.select: SELECT tbcrewuser.id ,tbcrewuser.created_at as createdAt ,tbcrewuser.modified_at as modifiedAt ,tbcrewuser.tbcrew_id as tbcrewId ,tbcrewuser.tbuser_id as tbuserId ,tbcrewuser.deleted ,tbcrewuser.process ,tbcrewuser.cate ,tbcrewuser.content ,tbcrew.id as tbcrewId ,tbcrew.process as tbcrewProcess ,tbcrew.title as tbcrewTitle ,IF(tbuser.deleted = 'Y', '(deleted)', tbuser.nick) as tbuserNick ,IF(tbuser.deleted = 'Y', '', tbuser.mpic) as tbuserMpic ,IF(tbcrewuser.process = tbcrew.process, 'alive', 'dead') as alive FROM tbcrewuser, tbcrew, tbuser WHERE tbcrewuser.tbuser_id = tbuser.id AND tbcrewuser.tbcrew_id = tbcrew.id AND tbcrewuser.id = #{id}
